author: timbalabuch
content:
I’m excited to share a project I’ve just launched:
[**www.ethdevwatch.xyz**](https://ethdevwatch.xyz/)
 
This platform automatically generates posts every Monday, using AI to create clear and comprehensive summaries.

**Data Sources:**
- Key Ethereum repositories
- Discussions from Ethereum Research forums
- Threads from Ethereum Magicians

I’d love to hear your thoughts and feedback! If you're interested, please explore the site and let me know how it can be improved.
